channel.title: RuneScape existance
channel.description: How long do you guys think RuneScape will exist? Like do you think it will be gone the next year, maybe the other?Will it never fail? :)

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @ak226688 ak226688
item.description:
@ak226688 wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:14, topic:282300"][quote author=vamp256 link=topic=373002.msg2815706#msg2815706 date=1244274670]

(Pest control, Soul wars, etc., those minigames really destroyed the point of actually training).

Pest control is good tho. it’s helpful with training…on RS when i was mem, like 2k ppl at PC…Thts a fullworld.
[/quote]

Pest control ruined combat training, combat used to actually take time to level up, now every other retard is a high level now, and the time it took people who played before those updates (who earned their combat), months, if not weeks of camping in areas to train, has gone to waste when it can be easily gotten in a week or two at PC or SW.[/quote]so true.

i dnt want rs to end , realy its all the rwt thats killing rs

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“vamp256, post:13, topic:282300”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=373002.msg2815355#msg2815355 date=1244249102]
(Pest control, Soul wars, etc., those minigames really destroyed the point of actually training).
[/quote]
Pest control is good tho. it’s helpful with training…on RS when i was mem, like 2k ppl at PC…Thts a fullworld.[/quote]

Pest control ruined combat training, combat used to actually take time to level up, now every other retard is a high level now, and the time it took people who played before those updates (who earned their combat), months, if not weeks of camping in areas to train, has gone to waste when it can be easily gotten in a week or two at PC or SW.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Chassy13:

If they keep making horrible updates, then it will in a few years.

I don’t see problems with there updates at all, besides making a few skills easier to train. Even though a few of them they shouldn’t have made (Pest control, Soul wars, etc., those minigames really destroyed the point of actually training).

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Jagex makes too much money from RS to consider shutting it down. Once they start losing profits from it (due to loss of interest, or everything just made way too easy to level, or even from their upcoming game MechScape) my bets is it will slowly fade away.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I would say that Jagex will stop hosting RuneScape when they stop making their massive profits, this will probably happen in the later stages, depending on how MechScape turns out, mostly.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Jagex will never stop hosting Runescape, they will probably only allow paying members play (like rsc).

I am afraid that the upcoming mechscape might appeal to more people and out-perform runescape. Jagex can say goodbye to their “Worlds most played free mmo” record.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape existance
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Obviously it won’t be around forever, Jagex said they will continue it as there main project for the next 5 years (till 2012/13), it’ll probably start dieing down alot before then, though. Then it will stop getting updated (or get long stretches of time between updates) and either get shut down, or barely have any players left at all.

Read full topic
